bibl.title: The King-Title "Basiliskos" in Nubia in the Fourth to Sixth Century AD.
bibl.note: The author suggests that the king-title 'basiliskos' (cf. S.B. III, 6257; 6258; V, 8536) from the fourth to sixth century AD implied that the king was a pagan.
bibl.seg: Hansen Ove, The King-Title "Basiliskos" in Nubia in the Fourth to Sixth Century AD.
The author suggests that the king-title 'basiliskos' (cf. S.B. III, 6257; 6258; V, 8536) from the fourth to sixth century AD implied that the king was a pagan.
